## About

This hands-on webinar introduces ways to integrate ORCID and DataCite workflows to improve attribution, tracking, and metadata quality across systems.
It focuses on two established integration methods: the ORCID Search & Link wizard and ORCID Auto-Update.
Slides and recordings are expected to be shared after the webinar via the DataCite Zenodo Community and the DataCite YouTube channel.
